name: Abde Lali

services.title: Full-Stack Web Development
services.description: Building robust and scalable web applications using Laravel, React.js, MySQL, and secure RESTful APIs.

services.title: REST API Design
services.description: Designing and developing efficient, secure RESTful APIs to connect systems and streamline data exchange.

services.title: MERN Stack Development
services.description: Building full-stack web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). From responsive front-end interfaces to scalable back-end APIs and NoSQL database integration, I deliver complete solutions tailored to your business needs.

services.title: Database Optimization
services.description: Designing and optimizing high-performance databases (MySQL, SQLite) for fast queries and scalable data structures.

services.title: Offline Web Applications
services.description: Developing web apps with offline functionality using technologies like Electron and local storage solutions.

services.title: Deployment & Maintenance
services.description: Deploying, maintaining, and continuously improving web applications using Git, Docker, and DevOps best practices.

aboutpara: Full-Stack Web Developer with practical experience building responsive, scalable web applications using Laravel, React, and modern tools. Skilled in API design, offline-first systems, and database optimization. Passionate about clean code, teamwork, and continuous learning.
